channel.title: Docker Compose on Marek's Blog (ᵔ◡ᵔ)
channel.description: Recent content in Docker Compose on Marek's Blog (ᵔ◡ᵔ)

item.title: Docker Compose Watch
item.description: In version 2.22.0 Docker Compose introduced Compose Watch feature, which allows Docker Compose users to automatically update and preview services running as soon as the work is saved.
